title: Research Interests
description: My current research interests, based on the academic literature I read.

interests.title: Meta-Research in HCI
interests.description: Understanding how research itself is conducted, evaluated, and evolves within the HCI community.

interests.title: Human-AI Collaboration
interests.description: Building socio-technical systems that allow humans and technology to work together to achieve tasks that would be beyond their individual capabilities.

interests.title: Prompt Engineering
interests.description: The practice and skill of finding effective input prompts for generative AI models, particularly in text-to-image generation.

interests.title: Crowdsourcing and Creative Work
interests.description: Supporting complex creative work through crowd-powered systems and creativity support tools.
